content: opened this topic, so compiler team members can give their opinion about having finalized fcps from other teams in the announcements section of the agenda
a way for different teams to sign off bigger changes, requiring explicit approval by all but 2 people from the team
and allowing members to raise blocking concerns

Also here a bit more context on what a "Final Comment Period" is:
https://forge.rust-lang.org/governance/index.html?#decision-making

compiler team members can give their opinion

not a compiler team member but I personally think adding these is helpful. They don't take a lot of place and help me notice interesting changes I might have otherwise missed
